QuestData.Title: Find Bristlehorn
QuestData.Description: Bristlehorn should have returned by now.$B$BThe other reason why we came up here was to investigate that Scourge structure to the west, which fell from the sky. He's impetuous and has likely gotten himself into trouble.$B$B$n, go to that place and find him, please.
QuestData.RewardText: I am... not... long for this... world, little $r.
